episodes.title: Guest: Richard A. Kiers, a Survivor of the Large Cult Known as "The Move"  Sharing His Crazy Story!
episodes.description:
Richard Tells of the Abuse and  Mind Control he Experienced and Witnessed in this Destructive Cult.  He is an author of the book:  Swindled By Faith:  A Time for Reconciliation and another coming shortly:  Silent Voices.  He has a  New Podcast:  Silent Voices and a Private Facebook Group:  Silent Voices

Richard Kiers:  Facebook Group & Podcast Called:  Silent Voices
His Book: Swindled by Faith:  A Time for Reconciliation  Buy Here on Amazon: https://a.co/d/5FSIMpg

More About Richard A. Kiers:
Having Grown Up and Then Escaping an Abusive Cult as a Teenager, known as, “The Move” – Our Guest Today, Richard A. Kiers will share with us just what he has endeavored to overcome as well as share insights that will hopefully encourage those on the same path – from captive slavery to ultimate freedom – mentally, emotionally, spiritually, physically and more.  Richard is the author of the book:  Swindled by Faith:  A Time for Reconciliation  https://a.co/d/5FSIMpg  which details his experience growing up in this cult and sharing the various forms of abuse he experienced and witnessed.  He since has become a prolific writer – enjoying his artistry flare by writing in various genres, autobiography, self-help, children’s books, fiction, non-fiction most of which are upcoming releases (17 books in total).  Currently, Richard is working on his 3rd book called, “Silent Voices” and has recently started his own Private Facebook Group and a Brand New Podcast all with the same name: “Silent Voices” where he helps his members wrap their heads around the tactics used by these cults – like disrupting our critical thinking processes – or freezing our emotional processing to gain and maintain control over members.  So, Richard encourages us to think for ourselves, to make our own decisions, and to get a grasp on how cult leaders think and operate and so much more.

More recently, he has been profiled in the Discovery ID Documentary Episode: “The Movement of God”  (People Magazine Investigates Cults) with another documentary in the making.

Richard currently resides in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.

episodes.description:
Scott Shares How Elder Father Was Ex-Communicated by United Church of God - Affecting His Health - Eventually Killing Him.  Scott shares how he believes today,   More on his 10 years of breakdown and dealing with this.  How did he get out and why.  What he still struggles with today - "the wall" he put up (and likewise his father) in order to protect ourselves.  The moment we stop playing god in our lives and in the lives of other and the process of "Surrender".  The splintering of the church and still splintering to the point of so much splitting, division and splintering that we begin to go straight to God.

episodes.title: Ex -Worldwide Church of God - Guest: Scott Williams - His Life In, then 10 Critical Dark Night Years
episodes.description:
Born in to the church in Cincinnati, OH, Scott shares the painful 10 years after leaving - losing himself and struggling to survive. - experiencing a "dark night of the soul".  He shares what it was like growing up as an  Elder's son, his father giving his life to counsel the people who called on him to fix them since he was an Elder and there were no mental health services available in the church. Scott was expected to be  perfect  and the "example" and feeling in his school years that "they" were "of the world" and he was a special, called out one and just didn't ft in especially since the world was going to end in 6 months so why try.  News of mom's critical life threatening illness with no treatment after he'd been gone 10 years.  Experience with Mom and Sister at a Powerful Week Long Retreat and how everything changed - lights came on!  He's very glad to be free now and with his mind back.

#Ex-Worldwide Church of God  #Armstrongism #struggle , #darknightofthesoul  #cultrecovery

episodes.title: 2024  FALLING INTO FALL - And Being Able to Enjoy the Pumpkin Patches, Fall Decorations, Apple Cider
episodes.description:
WWCOG Made us Feel So Fearful of Anything to do With the Fall Season, But It's Not ALL Bad & Evil.  Here's another view of the Fall Season and the good that is in it aside from the Halloween part of it (which I still don't like). But as a Worldwider, again, it seems like the fall was a dreaded time because people starting putting out bales of hay, scarecrows, having apple spiced apple cider, decorating with leaves and corn & corn husks and of course all the halloween stuff too.  But we feared it all.  We couldn't even see any of the good in any of it.  But God made fall and we should enjoy it.  There's a lot of good to be found in it.  Let me show you how rather than just pure avoidance.

Angela is an Ex-Worldwide Truth Seeker who seeks to encourage and uplift through words and song (music).

episodes.title: Part II -Clean & Unclean Foods - Giving You the Proof You Need; Finally Be Rid of the Guilt for Good
episodes.description:
I really lay it out here for you coming straight from the bible to show that we don't need or want to concern ourselves with this old covenant law any longer nor guilt our family or friends who see it differently as that is also wrong.  But after you listen to this - I bet you'll clearly see the "other side" of this teaching as even Jesus spells it out.  Why were we so blind to this?  How could our parents not have seen it.  I guess the only answer is that they want to feel safe  as their is safety in keep a set of laws that will get you into the God's good graces and the kingdom.  Abraham's kind of faith?  Forget that.  Too much work - too much unknown.  So, our minds can become blind and cannot see until we turn to God finally - who removes our blinders.  Amazing.  but I've laid it all out here.  Hope you'll listen all the way through

episodes.title: Series - Part Two - Unclean Foods  -  Do You Still Question Whether You Should Be Feeling Guilty...?
episodes.description:
What if Scripture is "real clear" about this subject here, but our minds have been programmed to believe a different way; that we're the "special & chosen ones" because we do this and we do that - different than "the world" and "those rebellious people out there"?  Let's just get it straight from the bible and then I'll share my perspective a little here and there.  But you decide - no need to listen to me!  I'm just going to present the straight bible that seems to say something completely different than the way we were taught from the way I see it after reading these "other" scriptures and putting them all together.  I'm not persuaded by any other religion either - this is my own research.  So, don't trust me, but maybe just listen to what I read here and you decide for yourself.

episodes.title: Were You Raised to Have Fear Around Money?  Feeling Guilt for Accepting Good for Yourself.  WWCOG?
episodes.description:
Are you  seeking for change and doing all you can to make the change - but it's just not happening.  Well Dan and Angela show the mechanics of how to make your faith work for you using real examples from their own lives.  They share how we have to first change our belief system programmed into us, how they managed to do that themselves and how it will work for you too  - if the same steps are followed (changing your mind).  This is well mapped out with scriptures that you may have never seen before.  We were taught to not want for anything more than "sustenance and covering" and to feel guilty if we do (want more for ourselves).  Well, the scriptures prove that God clearly does want more for us and that all of these promises (and God's wishes for us) are clearly spelled out.   Great change for you can be just around the corner.  Do you want change?  Check it out.

episodes.title: Did You Live in a Toxic Household? Find Out Now! The Life of Your Dreams Can Be Realized When You...
episodes.description:
Accept that YOU Matter - Yes You Matter!  As children - we all should have been cared for, nurtured, loved unconditionally and been treated with respect,  feeling validated, listened to and heard. Not living in this healthy household will cause havoc on our personal opinion of ourselves - affecting our life now!  
When you come to believe and face the truth about who you "really" are and not the piece of sh...t that you have always believed you are; forever wondering why you were made to be that way - less than perfect - things will begin to change rapidly in your life.  First comes the awareness of the dysfunctional tactics used in your family of origin and/or church, etc., like parents not respecting your boundaries, your feelings, being gaslighted, siblings being pitted against each other and one being favored more than another causing hatred, jealousy, competition; being loved conditionally and only when you obey and perform and NOT if you don't, etc. If this is not looked at and faced, then it becomes the definition of insanity:  doing the same thing the same way over and over and expecting to get a different result.  
I (Angela) got out of my second cult when I was nearly dead.  I asked for help from a God a thought hated me, and quickly found help.  That help lead me to the information we are sharing with you today.  It wasn't easy to face, but with support of a few new people that were brought into my life at that time and a few classes and two powerful books - my life began to change quickly.  I was married within a year and I have never looked back and continue to change to this day as we all should really, until we pass on.

Video Provided by:  Dan and Angela Clark

episodes.title: Ex-WWCOG Truth Seekers! Not Allowed to Enjoy Success?  Fear of Being Worldly? Has This Crippled You?
episodes.description:
Since Leaving WWCOG - Melina Oine made a hard decision, when it was almost too late to do it that she would GO BACK TO SCHOOL (College) and BECOME A HEALTH ADVOCATE!  None of it made any sense at the time considering her circumstances, her upbringing and especially WWCOG ability to keep woman from becoming much of anything but a homemaker.  She put one foot in front of the other doubting herself much of the time - but with much love and support - she GRADUATED with a MASTERS Degree in Health Advocacy a week ago!
Congratulations Melina and congratulations for overcoming the programming about how woman are not meant to succeed - let alone men for fear that this is worldly!  What do you think about this?  Do we need to experience success and a sense of accomplishment and the building of a certain sense of self with a bit of self-esteem to keep you confident and strong?  We say YES!  Armstrong used this tool to keep us all under his thumb of control along with his Leaders and Ministers.

About Melina Oine. Melina was born and raised in the WWCOG. Her family officially got out in the mid 90;s shortly after Tkach Jr. took on the mantle when Melina  was 17.  Melina actually almost completely stopped attending around the age of 15-16.  In her earlier years, Melina attended services in Anchorage Alaska until about 1985. At that point, her family moved to Honolulu, Hawaii where Melina lived until she was married at age 18 to a Navy  Marine.  They had 3 children together  About 12 years later, her  daughter was diagnosed with a life threatening disease which landed her in and out of emergency rooms and hospitals and soon after, Melina herself was diagnosed with an auto-immune condition that she was now also dealing with at the same time and started therapy.   That pushed her to look at her past and current traumas.  She discovered that the conditioning from childhood had predisposed her to being involved in a dysfunctional and traumatic  marriage and learning this, she was eventually at a point where she was able to leave the marriage.  

Melina recently moved to South-East Washington state where she now lives with her daughter and where she also has recently become board certified (BCPA) as an Independent Patient Advocate and now has just received her Masters in Health Advocacy!

episodes.description:

episodes.title: Sara Ahrenholtz - SPEAKS OUT After Coming Out of a CULT - Worldwide Church of God - For First Time!
episodes.description:
EPISODE 1 - Coming Out of Denial After Coming Out of a Cult is Step 1.  Being Honest About What Was Experienced is probably Step 2. Then being validated, often through counseling of some sort is very key and probably Step 3.  From there, healing can ensue as we continue to let go of the fear, the guilt, the lies, etc.  Sara tells about what it was like living under the heavy duty control in this mind bending, law driven, fear intense abusive cult. Dan and Angela (who was once in this cult) host the show and this is just the beginning, this being Episode 1 with Sara Ahrenholtz.  More to Come!

episodes.title: Perfectionism Sufferers - There is Hope for Us!  Listen: "I Love You Just the Way You Are"
episodes.description:
In this video, I will give you an arsenal of tools to overcome and how to see this differently. What we were taught growing up (usually from religion) that we're never good enough and will never measure up either.  That God will never be happy with us.  When we think we've got a handle on a weakness and manage to pat ourselves on the back, the next day - a solid setback.  Another failure - I failed myself, I failed God.

episodes.title: Am I Killing Myself with My Hate Thoughts Towards the World?
episodes.description:
We can get sour and resentful within ourselves when life and the world doesn't give us what we think we deserve.  Many of us were taught in our religions that the world is an unsafe place and is bad and a depressing place to be in.  We need to change our mind about this so we can function in this world in a way that supports what we are here on earth to do - not just waiting for it to end.  We see everyone as separate from us.  We have to learn to love our neighbor as we love ourselves which IS loving ourselves.  Dr. David R. Hawkins teaches about what happens when our thoughts and vibrations (negative or positive) affects our body, our health and our feeling that life is good or not good.  So we want to strive to be in the flow with God type thoughts - Joy, hopeful, optimistic, peace, harmony, etc.

episodes.title: Men Have an Ancestral Heart Wounding (Don't Cry) Woman to the Sacral Area (abdomen).How to Fix This?

Men need to be able to open their hearts again and not be afraid to be emotional, cry, be sensitive. Women have been told to not be strong, courageous or bold - but encouraged to be weak with no voice but check out the Proverbs 31 woman. She wasn't at all weak or quiet!.  Both need to come to the middle so that we are balanced.  A Balanced Man, a Whole Woman

episodes.title: Time to Use Our Voices.  It's What We're All Here to Learn
episodes.description:
We've all experienced abuse of all kinds and much suffering all for a reason.  We are meant to eventually be fed up with injustice and corruption and stand up - all of us.  Or not.  We can continue to suffer.  But I'm Telling You - We are meant to use it (our past suffering) for good.  Now is that time.  I hope we all begin to speak out for not just ourselves, but for our neighbor, the poor, the widow, the depressed, the mentally ill, the sick and "do unto others as we would have them do to us". And Jesus said, "as you've done it unto the least of these, you've done it unto me".  That's pretty amazing!  we've been through all that we have for "such a time as this".  I know we can do it!

www.angelasinspirations.com
Facebook:  Ex-Worldwide Truth Seekers
Facebook:  Life After Religion

episodes.title: Angela Visits a UCG (Former WWCG) Meeting - First Time in 15 Years   No Thanks!
episodes.description: I wanted to see what it feels like now after not having been for 15 years and that last visit was my first time in longer than that.  I am so glad to be out!  I share the attitudes, same old fear tactics, patriarchal control over women and members, depression, severe judgement and distain, hypocrisy, lying and more!  I'll also give a sneak peak about what is going on in the Old Big Sandy Campus in Texas and the Church of God Church and UCG church on the edge of it on either side.  Interesting!  Shocking!  What is going on!!!

episodes.title: A Different Way of Seeing Christmas & Overcoming Some of the Guilt & Fear of the Season for Ex-WWCG
episodes.description: Sorting Out How We Feel About This Season is Not Easy With Soooo Much Programming About This Holiday.  Let's Really Look at It Though with a Fresh Perspective.  We'll Share How We've Been Able to Process it to This Point and Maybe Help You Sort Out Just How to Deal with This Holiday Season and Relatives and Co-Workers too.  Here's WIshing You a Peaceful Holiday Season!  Dan and Angela Clark

episodes.title: How to Overcome the "Stuffing  It Down"  of Years and  How to Deal with the Silent Treatment
episodes.description: Growing up in Worldwide left us without some of the basic tools of communicating properly in our relationships and due to how we were raised - we learned to stuff everything since were weren't allowed to say what hurt.  In fact - children were to be seen and not heard and were valueless as well as women.  But we can overcome this and take back the control of not only our emotions but our very lives and find some real freedom, learning how to be authentic and easily deal with the dysfunction.  But first, we have to see the dysfunctional in our families for what it is.  We have to overcome the abuse and call it what it was.

episodes.title: Do You Want Relationships That Are Lasting & Satisfying? We'll Share With You Some Powerful Secrets!
episodes.description: Dan and Angela discuss what it takes to have relationships that are satisfying and successful - so that everyone wins and life feels good.  When we were in Worldwide Church of God we didn't learn these important tools.  We were living in toxic and unhealthy relationships everywhere we went.  We left not feeling like we fit in in this world and not knowing how to function.  We knew we lacked something - but what?  We use real examples to make our point.  We're honest and real.

episodes.title: Here's How I Got Out!  Betrayal Hurts! Loving My New Life Now!
episodes.description: Angela Clark shares her Moment of Betrayal By the Church and How She Decided to Move On.  Tells Her Story of Facing that She Was in A Cult by a Small Town Pastor. Sharing the Tools that Helped Her and Shares Her Story of Overcoming the Cult.  Check our her website too:  Ex-WorldwideTruth Seekers.com

episodes.title: WELCOME to Ex-Worldwide Truth Seekers - Cult Recovery
episodes.description:
Feeling Overwhelmed, Lost, Angry - Not Even Sure What's Wrong?  
I Started This Site Because I Couldn't Find Any Help Out There That Worked for Me.  I'm DEFINITELY OUT of the Box and Always Searching.  We're going to explore our thoughts & feelings looking outside the box and with Our Eyes Wide Open - Being Raw and Honest About our True Feelings - Facing Them and Looking at Things from Various Angles. We Heal as We Share and Get it Out.  But I Don't Want to Act Like We're Still in There Re-hashing and Re-Shaping Old Beliefs So As to Keep Them in a Revised Fashion.  We're Out!  Please Help This Community to Heal by Sharing Good Videos that Have Helped You and Let's Continue to Become our Best Selves - Shedding the Old Beliefs and Accepting Some New Ones!  Welcome!   

Check Out my Husbands Facebook and You Tube Page for Ex-JW's:  Life After Religion
Check Out My Facebook Page:  The Art of Healthy Relationships
My Website:  AngelasInspirations.com 
Dan's Site:  MyProdigalJourney.com
